We can try using our money to invest in the key economic sectors of our country, it will surely bring us prosperity!
Upper class is a backbone of our country but this backbone also has responsibilities, we should try cooperating with them for the mutual profit of the state the bourgeoisie and citizens!

The freer the market the freer the people! Or so they say... regardles of our opinions of it is undeniable that there are more than one paths to prosperity, and so we can try forging it on free capital and minimal government intervention.
Our reforms have proven to be quit successful, people start to that it is okay to have big families and so the economy starts growing!
The time has come, we have done countless reforms, and even more are being carried on, it is time for europeans to acknowledge us!
The time has come, we have done countless reforms, and even more are being carried on, it is time for europeans to acknowledge us!
Just like our father nation of the US, we can not stand just dewlling to the coast, it is time to expand so we can host as many honest African-Americans, returning to 'their' homeland, as possible!

Many people, over the time, have suggested the creation of Jewish state, one particulary fascinating idea is locating it in Madagascar. The Island weren't of much use to us, and creating the Isreali State could provide us with valuable ally in the region, as well as appease both Jewish people and anti-jewish elements that see them as 'hindrance' in our country.

Many European Countries call our country 'Persia' it is misleading name, bearing archaic conotations, and representing only one ethnic group withn the Iranian People. Perhaps we should try convince international community to change the name of our country in their languages to 'Iran', the name that is used within the country itself.
